item.title: 搭建博客
item.description: Hello world! 步骤操作 参考 https://mogeko.me/2018/018/ 配置文件 baseurl = "https://caiwp.github.io" languageCode = "zh-cn" theme = "terminal" # https://github.com/panr/hugo-theme-terminal/ paginate = 10 preserveTaxonomyNames = true publishDir = "../caiwp.github.io" [Permalinks] posts = "/:year/:filename/" [params] contentTypeName = "post" # ["orange", "blue", "red", "green", "pink"] themeColor = "orange" showMenuItems = 1 showLanguageSelector = false fullWidthTheme = false centerTheme = true [languages] [languages.en] languageName = "English" title = "Terminal" subtitle = "My blog" keywords = "" copyright = "" menuMore = "Show more" readMore = "Read more" readOtherPosts = "Read other posts" [languages.
